General.Name: Wemade Max Co. Ltd
General.Description: Wemade Max Co., Ltd. develops and offers mobile games worldwide. It provides games, such as Windrunner, Candypang, Wind Soul, Hero Stone, God of GoStop, and Silkroad. The company was formerly known as JOYMAX Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Wemade Max Co., Ltd. in March 2021. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Seongnam, South Korea.

1.Name: Joon Sung Kim
1.Title: Director of Management & Financial and Director
